parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets the selection state of given treeview item in multi-select control.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> control [[tvSetSelected]] [path, selected]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> selected: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[tvSetSelected]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>0], [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvSelection]] [[tvIsSelected]]
</value></part></template></root>
